project.title: [Client Redacted] - Server Workload Migration to Azure

challenge.summary: Migrate on-premises server workloads to cloud platform ensuring zero downtime, enhanced security, and compliance with public sector standards.

solution.summary: Strategic approach to server workload migration:
deliverables: Robust cloud architecture design in Azure
Security and compliance configuration (Azure Security Center, Policy, Blueprints)
Performance optimization with Azure Monitor and Application Insights

outcomes: ✅ Enhanced communication capabilities with cloud-based systems
✅ Increased reliability and scalability of services
✅ Secure and compliant environment meeting government standards
✅ Successful cloud transition with zero downtime
✅ Smooth transition with minimal operational disruption
